member.name: IPlayToSourceClassFactory.CreateInstance
member.summary: Creates an instance of the PlayToController object.
member.param: A bitwise OR of flags from the enumeration.
Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPlayToSourceClassFactory
member.summary: Creates an instance of the PlayToSource object.
